<!-- About Others -->
|vo_08_01_title      = About [[Jean]]: Help
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean - Help.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = After the [[Varka|Grand Master]] left on his expedition, all the affairs of the [[Knights of Favonius]], both big and small, have been left up to Jean. If only there was more I could do to help her...
|vo_08_01_mention    = Jean,Varka

|vo_08_02_title      = About Jean: Care
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean - Care.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = Jean might still be working? We should invite her for coffee... Let's go.
|vo_08_02_mention    = Jean

|vo_08_03_title      = About [[Lisa]]: Listening to Stories
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa - Listening to Stories.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = When you have time, we should go see Lisa! Last time I saw her, she was telling me about a story involving a treasure in the [[Dragonspine]] area. But, we got cut off before she could finish. I can't wait to hear the rest of her story!
|vo_08_03_mention    = Lisa

|vo_08_04_title      = About Lisa: Admiration
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa - Admiration.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = If Lisa's not sleeping, she'll be reading! I don't know how she does it, I wouldn't be able to sit still for that long.
|vo_08_04_mention    = Lisa

|vo_08_05_title      = About [[Kaeya]]: Concerns
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya - Concerns.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = ...I'm feeling uneasy all of a sudden! Was that Kaeya with you earlier? Did he give you any trouble?
|vo_08_05_mention    = Kaeya

|vo_08_06_title      = About Kaeya: Culprit
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya - Culprit.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = There's something weird-looking about the dandelions in the garden... Hmm, I bet Kaeya had something to do with this!
|vo_08_06_mention    = Kaeya

|vo_08_07_title      = About [[Bennett]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Bennett.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = Hmm? Bennett... I feel like I've heard that name before... Oh! Yes, he's that hot-blooded guy from the [[Adventurers' Guild]], right! I tend to come across him way out in the wild from time to time, he seems to really love treasure hunting.
|vo_08_07_mention    = Bennett

|vo_08_08_title      = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = Klee? She can be a bit cheeky sometimes, but everyone in the Knights of Favonius likes her. Although... I really ought to keep a closer eye on her if I wanna keep her from getting put in confinement by Jean again.
|vo_08_08_mention    = Klee,Jean

|vo_08_09_title      = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = Albedo spends most of his time in his workshop, tinkering away with all of his awesome stuff. But, when you see him in person, you can never quite tell what he is thinking, not a clue at all.
|vo_08_09_mention    = Albedo

|vo_08_10_title      = About [[Noelle]]
|vo_08_10_friendship = 4
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Noelle.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = You wanna know about Noelle? She's super resilient. Still, since she's younger than us, we should look out for her.
|vo_08_10_mention    = Noelle

|vo_08_11_title      = About [[Eula]]
|vo_08_11_friendship = 4
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Eula.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = Eula is a great friend of mine! You just need to get used to her sense of humor and you'll get along fine! The only reason she's misunderstood by so many people is her family name. How can I get them to see her for who she really is?
|vo_08_11_mention    = Eula

|vo_08_12_title      = About [[Collei]]
|vo_08_12_friendship = 4
|vo_08_12_quest      = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Collei.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = Collei wrote to me saying that her [[Eleazar]] has been completely cured... I'm so happy for her! I wish I could fly to her side right now and give her the biggest hug! She also said she misses everyone in Mondstadt, and that once she's ready, she'll come visit us in person and tell us all about her progress... Oh, it would be great if she could make it in time for the next [[Ludi Harpastum]]. Aaah I can't wait to see her again!
|vo_08_12_mention    = Collei

|vo_08_13_title      = About [[Mika]]
|vo_08_13_friendship = 4
|vo_08_13_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Mika.ogg
|vo_08_13_tx         = Oh! Mika's a veteran of Eula's team. When he first arrived, it was always "Yes, Commander!" every time he spoke to me &mdash; I guess it must have been because he saw how close I was with Eula. But then, even after I told him I was actually an Outrider, he still called me "Ma'am"... It was so embarrassing. We have completely different responsibilities, after all. I definitely could never match his expertise in cartography.
|vo_08_13_mention    = Mika,Eula

|vo_09_04_tx         = I joined the Knights because of my [[Amber's Grandfather|grandpa]], I stayed because of Jean. And now, you're the one that showed me the world beyond Mondstadt. I couldn't be happier.
|vo_09_04_mention    = Amber's Grandfather,Jean
